definitions.definition: A person affected by spastic paralysis or spastic cerebral palsy .
definitions.label_groups: now offensive , especially in UK and Ireland
slang , derogatory , offensive especially in UK and Ireland

main_definition: ( now offensive , especially in UK and Ireland ) A person affected by spastic paralysis or spastic cerebral palsy .
secondary_definitions: ( slang , derogatory , offensive especially in UK and Ireland ) A stupid, clumsy person.
